summary: After a young woman is brutally killed by an intruder, her husband and father conspire with a mysterious desert dweller to awaken her from the dead. Soon after she awakens, she begins to realize that something is horribly wrong.
cast: Nikki Moore|Scott Wilson|Scott Mitchell Nelson|James Mathers|Mark Craig|Douglas Bennett|Ronnie Gene Blevins|Christina Diaz|Jonna Walsh|Trisha Rae Stahl|Pia Eerikainen
keywords: cannibalism|female masturbation|loss of loved one|evil man|monster
title: Kiss the Abyss
